| HistoryText             = After beginning his murder spree against the unfeeling wealthy, the [[Caviar Killer (Joe) (Earth-616)|Caviar Killer]] brought together a group of like-minded individuals, all clad in shirts emblazoned with dollar signs, much like his own. When [[Matthew Murdock (Earth-616)|Daredevil]] discovered the location of their televised interview, they attacked him, only to be ordered to stand down by their leader. After the imprisonment of the Caviar Killer, the $ cult was never seen again.
